description.ko: 극한의 압력과 완전한 어둠을 위해 설계된 고성능 심해 탐사선 AQUA-5와 함께 미지의 심해 속 신비로운 비밀을 밝혀보세요.
description.en: Unveil the mysteries of the midnight zone with AQUA-5, a high-performance deep-sea probe designed to withstand extreme pressure and navigate the total darkness of the ocean floor.

prompt: Cinematic underwater shot of a futuristic AQUA-5 submersible drone exploring the dark, deep ocean abyss, glowing blue bioluminescent flora and fauna in the background, high-tech sensors, 8k resolution, photorealistic, moody lighting, particles in the water.
